name: Double Dunk
description:
Double Dunk is a basketball-based video game developed by Atari Corporation and released in 1989 for the Atari 2600. Programmed by Matthew Hubbard, Double Dunk was one of the last games produced by Atari for its most well-known console. Hubbard previously wrote Dolphin and Zenji for Activision.

Double Dunk was re-released in 2003 as part of the Atari Anthology collection.
